name: pyprismatic
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.1
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: pyprismatic
    version: 1.2.1
source:
    patches:
        - 0001-Fix-GUI_SOURCE_FILE-in-CMakeLists.txt.patch
        - 0001-Fix-python-blinding-on-windows.patch
        - 0001-fftw_cmake.patch
        - 0002-Set-output-name-for-cmake.patch
    sha256: 844f659575dd98999b7c4864e850a7ec735f297ab1fb6c2d2be91d7f9720fe70
    url: https://github.com/prism-em/prismatic/archive/1.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 3
    script: D:\a\1\s\recipe\build_pyprismatic.bat
    string: py36_cpu_h338272d_3
requirements:
    build:
        - cmake 3.16.4 he025d50_0
        - gettext 0.19.8.1 hb01d8f6_1002
        - glib 2.58.3 hc0c2ac7_1002
        - libffi 3.2.1 h6538335_1007
        - libiconv 1.15 hfa6e2cd_1006
        - m2w64-gcc-libgfortran 5.3.0 6
        - m2w64-gcc-libs 5.3.0 7
        - m2w64-gcc-libs-core 5.3.0 7
        - m2w64-gmp 6.1.0 2
        - m2w64-libwinpthread-git 5.0.0.4634.697f757 2
        - msys2-conda-epoch 20160418 1
        - pcre 8.44 h6538335_0
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 h8cfccfd_1006
        - vc 14.1 h0510ff6_4
        - vs2015_runtime 14.16.27012 hf0eaf9b_1
        - vs2015_win-64 14.0.25420 h55c1224_11
        - zlib 1.2.11 h2fa13f4_1006
    host:
        - boost 1.72.0 py36h96a391d_0
        - boost-cpp 1.72.0 h0caebb8_0
        - bzip2 1.0.8 hfa6e2cd_2
        - certifi 2019.11.28 py36h9f0ad1d_1
        - fftw 3.3.8 nompi_hbc43ac9_1110
        - h5py 2.10.0 nompi_py36h422b98e_102
        - hdf5 1.10.5 nompi_ha405e13_1104
        - intel-openmp 2020.0 166
        - libblas 3.8.0 15_mkl
        - libcblas 3.8.0 15_mkl
        - liblapack 3.8.0 15_mkl
        - mkl 2020.0 166
        - numpy 1.18.1 py36h48dd78f_1
        - pyreadline 2.1 py36_1001
        - python 3.6.10 he025d50_1009_cpython
        - python_abi 3.6 1_cp36m
        - setuptools 46.1.3 py36h9f0ad1d_0
        - six 1.14.0 py_1
        - vc 14.1 h0510ff6_4
        - vs2015_runtime 14.16.27012 hf0eaf9b_1
        - wincertstore 0.2 py36_1003
        - zlib 1.2.11 h2fa13f4_1006
    run:
        - boost >=1.72.0,<1.72.1.0a0
        - fftw >=3.3.8,<4.0a0
        - h5py
        - hdf5 >=1.10.5,<1.10.6.0a0
        - numpy
        - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
        - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
        - vc >=14,<15.0a0
test:
    commands:
        - python -c "import pyprismatic; pyprismatic.demo()"
about:
    description: 'CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission
        Electron Microscopy (STEM) experiments

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/prism-em/prismatic
    home: http://prism-em.com/
    license: GPL-3.0-only
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: CPU / GPU software for fast simulation of Scanning Transmission Electron
        Microscopy (STEM) experiments
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - douglowe
        - ericpre
        - tschoonj
